## FieldLabel.doClassValidation\_() method

Ensure that the input value casts to a valid string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected doClassValidation_(opt_newValue?: any): string | null;
```

|  opt\_newValue | any | <i>(Optional)</i> The input value. |
